giftCodes.rewards: 2 Recruitment Tokens, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Ruby Chests, 5 Level-tied Meat Chests

steps.title: The 7-Day Sprint
steps.description: Complete the Beginner's Goals event daily for seven consecutive days
tips: Don't miss a single day - rewards are cumulative
Have a friend reach Castle Level 5 to get Wilderness Hunter
Focus on daily quests first thing each day

steps.title: Adventure Mode Strategy
steps.description: Farm bosses and explore every corner of the map
tips: Farm bosses repeatedly with spare energy to collect Epic Gear
Search corners for hidden decorative items
Rescue all encountered villagers for production bonuses
Epic gear drops significantly boost your power

steps.title: Construction Queues
steps.description: Get your second building queue as soon as possible
tips: Purchase permanently if you can afford it
Or spend 500 Diamonds for 2-day rental during events
Having 2 queues doubles your building speed

steps.title: Join an Active Guild
steps.description: Find a guild that provides regular assistance and rewards
tips: Look for guilds with 40+ active members
Enable auto-join rallies in the War tab
Participate in Guild Arms Race for huge rewards
Request assistance on all buildings/research

steps.title: Focus Your Hero Leveling
steps.description: Concentrate resources on your main roster only
tips: For F2P: Prioritize League faction heroes Pyro and Secret Keeper
Pyro's 'Meteor Blaze' ability is incredibly powerful
Don't waste resources leveling heroes you won't use
Keep 5-6 main heroes at your castle level

steps.title: Smart Diamond Spending
steps.description: Diamonds are precious - spend them wisely
tips: Event shop items are the best value
VIP Points give permanent bonuses
Wheel Tokens aligned with your faction schedule
Never buy resource packs with diamonds
Save for special events and limited offers

steps.title: Daily Optimization Routine
tasks: Clear all Bounties for improved rewards
Use Carriages 4x daily (prioritize Mythic variants with Legendary Shards)
Spend all energy on Adventure mode or events

steps.title: Building Priority Order
steps.description: Follow this sequence for optimal progression
tips: Always keep Castle upgrading
Research Cottage should match Castle level
Resource buildings can wait until you have spare builders

steps.title: Research Focus
priorities: Combat Power (when you have spare time)

steps.title: Learn from the Community
steps.description: Use tier lists and avoid common mistakes
tips: Check hero tier lists before investing heavily
Join Discord for real-time help
Watch for meta shifts when new heroes release
Don't blindly follow guides - adapt to your situation

principles.title: Focus on One Faction
principles.description: Pick League, Horde, or Nature and stick with it
principles.reasoning: Spreading resources across multiple factions will severely slow your progression
tips: Nature: Best for PvP defense, master of sustain
Horde: Raw damage, kings of PvE and bosses, cheapest to build
League: Heavy skill damage, expensive but powerful

principles.title: Soldiers are Mandatory
principles.description: Always ensure your heroes have max soldiers
principles.reasoning: Soldiers are a significant part of your team's power and often the difference between winning and losing
tips: Upgrade your Barracks regularly
Research soldier capacity technologies
Train soldiers constantly
Soldiers can be 30-40% of your total power

principles.title: Save Universal Shards for Mythics
principles.description: Never use Universal Legendary Shards on Legendary heroes
principles.reasoning: Mythic heroes are much stronger in the long run and harder to obtain
tips: Universal Shards are extremely rare
Mythics need 300+ shards to max
Legendaries will come naturally over time
This mistake can set you back months

principles.title: Manage Meat Resources Carefully
principles.description: Don't waste meat on heroes you won't use long-term
principles.reasoning: Meat becomes a major bottleneck in mid-game
tips: Only level heroes in your main lineup
Epic heroes are fine for early game but don't over-invest
Keep 50k+ meat in reserve for events
Meat production is limited - treat it like a premium resource

system.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors System
system.description: Nature beats Horde, Horde beats League, League beats Nature
system.damageBonus: Winning faction deals 30% more damage and takes 30% less
system.importance: Understanding faction advantages is crucial for PvP

factions.name: Nature
factions.description: Master of sustain and summons. Excellent for PvP defense
strengths: Best sustain and healing in the game
Tidecaller is arguably the best hero in the game
Hard to kill in PvP defense

keyHero.name: Tidecaller
keyHero.description: Arguably the best hero in the game. Can tank, heal, and deal damage
keyHero.priority: Get this hero as early as possible

factions.name: Horde
factions.description: Raw damage output. The absolute kings of PvE and Boss damage
strengths: Cheapest faction to build (fewer awakened Legendaries needed)
Wanderer is an insane damage carry

keyHero.name: Wanderer
keyHero.description: Essential for Horde. Highest single-target damage in game

factions.buildingCost: Low - cheapest faction to build competitively

factions.name: League
factions.description: Heavy skill damage. Powerful but expensive to build
strengths: Paragon is a monster damage dealer
weaknesses: Requires up to 27 Soul Stones for full roster

keyHero.name: Paragon
keyHero.description: League's main carry. High skill damage with AoE potential

factions.buildingCost: High - requires 27 Soul Stones for full roster development

epicHeroTraits.title: Epic Hero Passive Traits (2-Star Platinum)
epicHeroTraits.description: Epic heroes unlock global passive bonuses at 2-Star Platinum

highestPriority.reasoning: Research speed is one of the most valuable permanent bonuses in the game
More soldiers = more power. Training speed is critical

tips: These bonuses are permanent and global
Work even if the hero isn't in your active lineup
Prioritize getting these two heroes to 2-Star Platinum early
Other Epic heroes have useful but less critical bonuses
